default.value: Agent Company RPG project fully set up with GitHub automation, swarm workflows, BMAD milestones, and issue triage system. Repository: yogi-bear-92/agent-company-rpg
Automated swarm workflow system activated via GitHub issues. Issue #5 successfully completed with 4 agents (CodeMaster, Sage, Bard, Scout) in mesh topology. Real-time knowledge sharing implemented.

BMAD methodology implemented with 4 milestones and 9 main issues: BUILD (3), MEASURE (2), ANALYZE (2), DECIDE (2). All issues have detailed subtasks and are properly labeled and assigned to milestones.

Components created: React AgentCompanyRPG.tsx, GitHub Actions workflows (swarm-orchestration.yml, swarm-monitor.yml), issue templates (swarm_task.yml), 24+ GitHub labels, CLI tool (swarm-cli.sh), issue triage config
Planned integrations: Archon knowledge system (Supabase+pgvector), DAA autonomous agents (Rust+MRARA loops), rUv token economy, Claude-Flow neural analytics, Prime ML distributed training

Project files saved in: /Users/yogi/agent-rpg-project/ (main project), /Users/yogi/docs/ (documentation: agent-company-rpg-bmad-plan.md, agent-rpg-archon-integration-plan.md, agent-rpg-daa-integration.md)

Initial performance analysis: Bundle size 246.94kB, XP calculations appear to run on each render, large agent dataset (4 agents with complex state), no memoization detected, no lazy loading implemented
